
```{r, include=F}

library(zip)

```

```{r}
# Define the directories containing the CSV files
directories <- c("acceleration", "invasion", "events", "passing")

# Loop through each directory and create a ZIP archive
setwd("./data/")
for (dir in directories) {
  # Get list of all csv files
  zip_file_name <- paste0(dir, ".zip")
  csv_files <- list.files(path = dir, pattern = "\\.csv$", full.names = TRUE)
  
  # Create the ZIP archive containing all CSV files in the directory
  zip::zip(zipfile = zip_file_name, files = csv_files)
  cat("Created ZIP archive:", zip_file_name, "\n")
}

setwd("..")

```
